title: Why HR Might Not be a Right Place to Report Sexual Harassment

author: Doug Stanglin
description: After 50 years in the news and TV industry, Ailes was ousted last year in a sexual harassment scandal involving former anchor Gretchen Carlson.
title: Roger Ailes, former Fox News chairman, dead at 77

author: Brian Stelter
description: Kellyanne Conway's Wednesday night interview on Fox News was going to be a big deal. But the White House abruptly canceled her appearance, causing Fox host Tucker Carlson to fill the air time by discussing the cancellation.Mueller's appointment as special counsel overseeing the federal government's Russia investigation.
title: White House PR strategy in chaos: Conway interview offered to Fox, then canceled
